thread.title: Jay Z May Have Taken Shots At Drake On DJ Khaled's "Shining"

author: Zakk Feig
title: Jay Z May Have Taken Shots At Drake On DJ Khaled's "Shining"

persons.name: jay z may have taken sho

text:
Home > Music > Jay Z May Have Taken Shots At Drake On DJ Khaled's "Shining" Jay Z May Have Taken Shots At Drake On DJ Khaled's "Shining" 0 0   13, 2017 at 03:16am Could Jay Z be stirring up beef with Drake? 
This has been a wild night for hip-hop. After the Grammys ended, DJ Khaled dropped what has to be the biggest song released this year thus far, " Shining (Feat. Beyonce & Jay Z) ." Aside from the obvious magnitude of a track like this, Twitter blew up with accusations that Hov was dissing none other than Drake on the track. Check out the accusatory tweet below. — Irv (@thisisIRV) February 13, 2017 
Some on Twitter saw this as just one jab in a series of shots, spanning "Summer Sixteen," "I Got The Keys," and most recently, "Sneakin." Jay Z didn't shout out 21 Savage . That was him taking a subliminal shot back at Drake. Cause he dissed Jay on sneakin. Real clever #Shining pic.twitter.com/U98wrs3OxE
